Dated, the 3) January, 2018 Policy Circular_ 124.5/2018 Corrigendum Sub: Post retirement medical facility (Outdoor Treatment for NHAI employees. Reference to the Policy Circular no_ 11041/230/2007-Admn dated 17.12.2009 on the above subject (copy enclosed): 2 The following corrigendum may please be made in para 3 of cited policy circular: Para 3 For: The last pay (i.e. pay in pay band Grade Pay) drawn by the Officer/employee shall be applicable for the purpose of fixing the ceiling limit of reimbursement through self- certification. In the case of subsequent revision in pay scale, the corresponding pay in revised pay scale as fixed by NHAI (HQ) shall be applicable. Read: - The last pay (i.e. pay in pay band Grade Pay) drawn by the Officer/employee shall be applicable for the purpose of fixing the ceiling limit of reimbursement through self- certification. In the case of subsequent revision in pay scale , the corresponding pay in revised pay scale as fixed notionally by NHAI (HQ) shall also be applicable to the retired employees. 3 Rest no change. 31 0 (V K.
